DOC.brief_summary: To determine the safety and tolerability of repeated dosing with Apomorphine Nasal Powder in subjects with Parkinson's Disease.
DOC.brief_title: Apomorphine Nasal Powder in the Treatment of Parkinson's Disease "Off" Periods.
DOC.criteria: 1 year history of Parkinson's Disease; stable PD medications for 4 weeks; at least one documented "off" period per day hypersensitivity to apomorphine; participation in a clinical trial in the last 12 weeks; pregnant or lactating females
